content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I have your name to get started with booking your plumbing service?
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability in your area?
Thanks! Let me check if your area is within our service region.
I'm having trouble confirming your location. Could you please double-check your address and include any nearby landmarks or additional details that might help us find your property?
It's right across from the Holiday Market, next to the park entrance.
Thank you for the extra details. Let me try checking your location again to see if we can service it.
I apologize, but I'm still unable to confirm if your location is in our service area. Would you like to provide a zip code or contact our office for further assistance?
My zip code is 12345. If this doesn't work, I'll just call instead.
Thank you for the zip code. I'll make one more attempt to verify if your address is within our service area.
I'm very sorry, but I'm unable to confirm whether we can service your area. I recommend giving our office a call so a team member can assist you directly. Thank you for your patience, Linda.
